content: granny s pocket bag pattern is for the bag only designed for use with many of my granny square patterns including but not limited to granny s eye alternate version grandpa s free alien head the night owl playing in the poppies free magic toadstool strawberry pop-ups granny s heart and many more extensive list included in the pattern any square ending in 96 sts will work the bag is worked from the squares up and the entire bag folds into the pocket created by the 2 squares joined together
